sentences.en: If breathing carbon dioxide seems uninviting, the density of the air will appear worse.
sentences.cn: 如果说呼吸二氧化碳令人生厌的话, 那么空气的密度就显得更为糟糕.

sentences.en: She really uninviting , but she is a really nice lady inside.
sentences.cn: 她其貌不扬, 但是个性非常善良.

sentences.en: The building was cold, dark, and uninviting.
sentences.cn: 那幢大楼又冷又黑，让人不敢进去。

sentences.en: The hotel room was bare and uninviting.
sentences.cn: 这个旅馆房间光秃秃的,很不好看.

words.tran_cn: 讨厌的，无吸引力的；无魅力的

trans.tran_cn: 不动人的，无魅力的，讨厌的
trans.tran_en: an uninviting place seems unattractive or unpleasant
